meaningMnemonic: After the <radical>tsunami</radical> the <radical>sun</radical> comes out again and shines on these <radical>spikes</radical>. They were super wet before, but you figure the sun probably dried them off. You lean down to touch them and nope, they's still <kanji>damp</kanji>.
readingMnemonic: As you're looking at the <kanji>damp</kanji> spikes, a <reading>shih tzu</reading> (しつ) prances over, slips on the damp ground, and falls right on the spike! Oh nooo!
